comments.author: Anas Malas

comments.text:
Why did the old guy swap the kids in the first place? I understand leaving 
the kid if you want no kids, or taking the kid if you want two kids- but 
why swap your kid for a kid who is similar enough that the parents can't 
tell the difference?
Was the first kid's blood-type more valuable on ebay? Was the second kid 
really annoying as a baby? 
Any ideas? ﻿
